FEATURE_1_BODY: Unlock limitless shades and hues with our intuitive color picker. Fine-tune your desired tones for the perfect ambiance.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Automate your lighting with schedules, timers, and voice commands. Effortlessly sync your lights with your daily routine.

FEATURE_4_BODY: Control your lights from anywhere using our user-friendly mobile app. Manage your home's ambiance even when you're away.

FEATURE_6_BODY: Seamlessly connect your Hue lights with other smart home devices, creating a unified and personalized living experience.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Mastering the Hues: Your Guide to Color Brilliance
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Unlock the power of vibrant hues with our intuitive app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the Hue app all about?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: The Hue app is your ultimate companion for exploring and creating stunning color combinations. Whether you're an artist, designer, or simply someone who appreciates the beauty of colors, this app empowers you to unleash your creativity.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the app help me work with colors?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app provides a user-friendly interface that allows you to effortlessly mix, match, and adjust colors. You can experiment with different hues, shades, and tints to find the perfect palette for your projects. Additionally, you'll have access to a vast library of pre-made color schemes for inspiration.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save and share my color creations?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! The Hue app lets you save your favorite color combinations and export them in various formats for use in your digital or print projects. You can also share your creations with friends, colleagues, or the vibrant community of color enthusiasts within the app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is the app suitable for professionals?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Definitely! While the Hue app caters to everyone who loves colors, it also offers advanced features tailored for professionals in the design, art, and creative industries. You'll find tools for color theory, accessibility analysis, and precise color adjustments to meet industry standards.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I get started with the Hue app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Getting started is easy! Simply download the Hue app from your preferred app store, and you'll be guided through a quick onboarding process. Feel free to explore the features, browse the color library, and start creating your own masterpieces right away. Our user-friendly interface ensures a smooth and enjoyable color experience.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Hue App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: The Hue app is a user-friendly tool that allows you to control and customize the lighting in your home through your Philips Hue smart bulbs. With intuitive controls and a wide range of features, you can easily set the perfect ambiance for any occasion.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How do I connect my Hue bulbs to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Connecting your Hue bulbs is simple. First, make sure your Hue Bridge is set up and connected to your home Wi-Fi network. Then, open the Hue app and follow the on-screen instructions to add your Hue Bridge and pair your bulbs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I create custom lighting scenes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! One of the standout features of the Hue app is the ability to create and save custom lighting scenes. You can adjust the brightness, color, and even set schedules for your scenes to automate your lighting experience.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app compatible with voice assistants?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, the Hue app integrates seamlessly with popular voice assistants like Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple's Siri. With simple voice commands, you can control your Hue lights hands-free, making it even more convenient to manage your home's lighting.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Mix any color you can imagine

PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Set schedules, create routines, and automate your Hue lighting to dynamically adapt to your daily rhythms, enhancing your moods and experiences.

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from some of the artists and creatives who love using Hue.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Hue has completely revolutionized my painting process. The ability to precisely mix and match colors digitally before putting brush to canvas has saved me so much time and materials.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a graphic designer, having access to Hue's massive color library and hex code generation has been a gamechanger. My branding projects look more polished than ever.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I'm blown away by how intuitive yet powerful Hue is. Whether I'm designing a new product or just redecorating, Hue makes choosing colors fun and easy.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Craft Vibrant Hues with Effortless Blending
